member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource
member.summary: The Data Source implementation for Telerik.OpenAccess
member.remarks: An ObjectScopeProvider is requiered to connect the datasource to the database.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor used from the Visual Studio designer.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.GetHierarchicalView(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the data source view object for the OpenAccessDataSource. The viewPath parameter can be a valid OQL query.
member.param: An OQL query that identifies a node from which the current hierarchical view is built.
member.returns: Returns an HierarchicalDataSourceView object that represents a single view of the data starting with the data node identified by the viewPath parameter.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.GetView(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the data source view that is associated with the OpenAccessDataSource object.
member.param: The name of the view to retrieve, which must be "DefaultView".
member.returns: The data source view that is associated with the OpenAccessDataSource object.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.GetViewNames
member.summary: Returns a collection of names that represents the list of view objects that are associated with the OpenAccessDataSource control.
member.returns: A collection with one element that contains the name "DefaultView".

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Adds a LoadComplete event handler to the Page control that contains the OpenAccessDataSource control.
member.param: An EventArgs object that contains event data.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.OnUnload(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the Unload event.
member.param: An EventArgs object that contains event data.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.CreateView
member.summary: Returns the default implementation of the DataSourceView used. Override to provide custom implementation.
member.returns: The OpenAccessDataSourceView that was created in the method

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.LoadControlState(System.Object)
member.summary: Loads the state of the properties in the OpenAccessDataSource control that need to be persisted.
member.param: The Object that contains state information.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.SaveControlState
member.summary: Saves the state of the properties in the OpenAccessDataSource control that need to be persisted.
member.returns: The Object that contains state information.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the OpenAccessDataSource control dynamically creates an ORDER BY clause based on values in the OrderByParameters collection.
member.value: true if the OpenAccessDataSource control creates the ORDER BY clause; otherwise false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the OpenAccessDataSource control dynamically creates a WHERE clause based on values defined in the WhereParameters collection.
member.value: true if the OpenAccessDataSource control creates the WHERE clause; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.StoreOriginalValuesInViewState
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data from the data source should be stored in view state to make sure that the data has not been changed by another process before it is updated or deleted.
member.value: true if the values will be stored in view state; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.EnablePaging
member.summary: Controls weather the DataSource should use database paging.
member.value: true if the user can page through the data; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.AutoPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the OpenAccessDataSource control supports navigation through sections of the data at run time.
member.value: true if the user can page through the data; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.AutoSort
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the OpenAccessDataSource control supports sorting the data at run time.
member.value: true if the user can sort the data; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.ContextTypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the fully qualified name of the typed IObjectScope context used by the OpenAccessDataSource control.
member.value: A String that is the fully qualified name of the type.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.ObjectContextProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the fully qualified name of the typed IObjectContextProvider class used by the OpenAccessDataSource control.
member.remarks: An ObjectContextProvider class might be generated by the Visual Studio Integration Wizards.
member.value: A String that is the fully qualified name of the type.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.ContextType
member.summary: Gets or sets the typed IObjectScope context used by the OpenAccessDataSource control.
member.value: The type that is associated with the data context class specified in the ContextTypeName property.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Extent
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the entity set used by the OpenAccessDataSource control.
member.value: The entity set name.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.TypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the type name that limits the query to only results of a specific derived type.
member.value: The filter expression.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Where
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies which filter is used for retrieving data.
member.value: A string that is used to create the Filter Expressions.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.WhereParameters
member.summary: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the WHERE clause.
member.value:
Represents a collection of System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter and System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter-derived
objects that are used by data source controls in advanced data-binding scenarios.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.CommandText
member.summary: Gets or sets an OQL command that defines the query.
member.value: A string value that is the OQL query.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.CommandParameters
member.summary: Gets the parameter collection for the query.
member.value: A ParameterCollection that contains the parameters that are passed to the query command.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.DeleteParameters
member.summary: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during a delete operation.
member.value: The parameters that are used during a delete operation.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.UpdateParameters
member.summary: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an update operation.
member.value: The parameters that are used during an update operation.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.SelectParameters
member.summary: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the projection.
member.value: The parameters that are used for creating the projection.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Select
member.summary: Gets or sets the projection that defines the properties to include in the query results.
member.value: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.OrderBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the OQL expression that specifies how to order the query results.
member.value: The ORDER BY clause.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.OrderByParameters
member.summary: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the ORDER BY clause.
member.value: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.InsertParameters
member.summary: Gets the collection of parameters that are used during an insert operation.
member.value: The parameters that are used during an insert operation.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.GroupBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the OQL expression that specifies how to group the query results.
member.value: The GROUP BY clause.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.EnableDelete
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data records can be deleted through the OpenAccessDataSource control.
member.value: true if automatic delete operations are enabled; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.EnableUpdate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be modified through the OpenAccessDataSource control.
member.value: true if automatic update operations are enabled; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.EnableInsert
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source view supports adding new rows.
member.value: true if the view supports inserting rows; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.ContextCreated
member.summary: Occurs when the OpenAccessDataSource has finished creating the IObjectScope context instance used to work with data objects.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.ContextCreating
member.summary: Occurs when the OpenAccessDataSource creates the IObjectScope context instance used to work with data objects.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.ContextDisposing
member.summary: Occurs before an IObjectScope context instance is disposed.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Deleted
member.summary: The Deleted event enables you to access an object that was deleted from the data source. The Entity property of the OpenAccessDataSourceChangedEventArgs object is used to access the deleted object.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Deleting
member.summary: The Deleting event enables you to access an object before it is deleted from the data source or to cancel the operation. The Entity property of the OpenAccessDataSourceChangingEventArgs holds the object being deleted.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Inserted
member.summary: The Inserted event enables you to access an object created in the data source. The Entity property of the OpenAccessDataSourceChangedEventArgs instance is used to access the added object.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Inserting
member.summary: The Inserting event enables you to modify or verify the object being added, add a different object, or cancel the operation. Handle this event to access the object to be added from the Entity property of the OpenAccessDataSourceChangingEventArgs instance.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Selected
member.summary: The Selected event enables you to access the results of a query and retrieve row count information. Handle this event when you want to access object results or store objects in the view state.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Selecting
member.summary: The Selecting event enables you to modify the configuration of the OpenAccessDataSource and to read or change the arguments from the data-bound control before the query is constructed and executed. Handle this event when you want to modify the paging or sorting behaviors of the control, or to cancel the query.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Updated
member.summary: The Updated event enables you to access an object that has just had changes persisted to the data source. The Entity property of the OpenAccessDataSourceChangedEventArgs instance is used to access the updated object.

member.name: E:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSource.Updating
member.summary: The Updating event enables you to modify or verify changes to the object, supply a different object, or cancel the operation before the changes are persisted. You can access the modified object from the Entity property of the OpenAccessDataSourceChangingEventArgs object. Handle this event to verify or validate changes, or to set different original values for concurrency control.

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceContextCreatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the ContextCreated event.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceContextCreatedEventArgs.Context
member.summary: Gets the IObjectScope instance used by the data source.
member.value: The object context used by the data source.

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the ContextCreating event.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context
member.summary: Gets the IObjectScope instance used by the data source.
member.value: The object context used by the data source.

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the ContextDisposing event.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs.Context
member.summary: Gets the IObjectScope instance used by the data source.
member.value: The object context used by the data source.

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the Inserted, Updated, and Deleted events.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Context
member.summary: Gets the IObjectScope instance used by the data source.
member.value: The object context used by the data source.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Entity
member.summary: Gets the object being added, modified, or updated.
member.value: An Object that is the entity.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangedEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: Gets the exception that was thrown during the query.
member.value: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.
member.value: true if the exception was handled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangingEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the Inserting, Updating, and Deleting events.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Context
member.summary: Gets the IObjectScope instance used by the data source.
member.value: The object context used by the data source.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Entity
member.summary: Gets the object being added, modified, or updated.
member.value: An Object that is the entity.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangingEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: Gets the exception that was thrown during the query.
member.value: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceChangingEventArgs.ExceptionHandled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.
member.value: true if the exception was handled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the Selected event.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Context
member.summary: Gets the IObjectScope instance used by the data source.
member.value: The object context used by the data source.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: Gets the exception that was thrown during the query.
member.value: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.
member.value: true if the exception was handled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.Results
member.summary: Gets the objects returned by the query.
member.value: Objects returned by the query.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.SelectArguments
member.summary: Gets values that determine how the data is returned.
member.value: An object that contains values for determining how the data is returned.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectedEventArgs.TotalRowCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of objects returned by the query.
member.value: The total number of object returned.

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectingEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the Selecting event.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.DataSource
member.summary: Gets the OpenAccessDataSource instance that raised the Selecting event.
member.value: The data source that raised the Selecting event.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.SelectArguments
member.summary: Gets values that determine how the data is returned.
member.value: The data source that raised the Selecting event.

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.ConcurencyMode
member.summary: The mode that OpenAccessDataSource uses for concurrency control when storing concurrency relevant information in the View State

member.name: F:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.ConcurencyMode.Version
member.summary: The persistent class whose objects are exposed by OpenAccessDataSource has a version field - visible or internal, OpenAccessDataSource uses tha for concurrency checks

member.name: F:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.ConcurencyMode.Changed
member.summary: The persistent class whose objects are exposed by OpenAccessDataSource does not contain a version field - OpenAccessDataSource uses the 'changed' concurrency mechanism

member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView
member.summary: The Data Source View implementation for Telerik.OpenAccess
member.remarks: An ObjectScopeProvider is requiered to connect the datasource to the database.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Performs a delete operation on the list of data that the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView object represents.
member.param: An System.Collections.IDictionary of object or row keys to be deleted by the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary) operation.
An System.Collections.IDictionary of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.
member.returns: The number of items that were deleted from the underlying data storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Performs an insert operation on the list of data that the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView object represents.
member.param: An System.Collections.IDictionary of name/value pairs used during an insert operation.
member.returns: The number of items that were inserted into the underlying data storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Performs an update operation on the list of data that the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView object represents.
member.param: An System.Collections.IDictionary of object or row keys to be updated by the update operation.
An System.Collections.IDictionary of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their new values.
An System.Collections.IDictionary of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.
member.returns: The number of items that were updated in the underlying data storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)
member.summary: Gets a list of data from the underlying data storage.
member.param: A System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
member.returns: An System.Collections.IEnumerable list of data from the underlying data storage.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.IsEqual(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the 2 values are equal. "" and null are seen as equal!
member.param: The value comming from the web element

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.LoadViewState(System.Object)
member.summary: Restores the previously saved view state for the data source view.
member.param: The OpenAccessDataSourceView control state to restore.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.SaveViewState
member.summary: Saves the changes to view state for the OpenAccessDataSourceView instance since the time that the page was posted back to the server.
member.returns: The object that contains the changes to the OpenAccessDataSourceView instance view state, or null if there is no view state associated with the object.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.TrackViewState
member.summary: Tracks view state changes.

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.GetViewSchema
member.summary: Returns a table that represents the OpenAccessDataSourceView.
member.returns: A table that contains the properties of the OpenAccessDataSourceView.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.EnableDelete
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data records can be deleted through the data view.
member.value: true if automatic delete operations are enabled; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.EnableUpdate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects can be modified through the data view.
member.value: true if automatic update operations are enabled; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.EnableInsert
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data view view supports adding new rows.
member.value: true if the view supports inserting rows; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.Where
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies which filter is used for retrieving data.
member.value: A string that is used to create the Filter Expressions.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the OpenAccessDataSourceView object that is associated with the current OpenAccessDataSource control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.
member.value: Always true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.CanPage
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView object associated with the current System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl object supports paging through the data retrieved by the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments) method.
member.value: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false. The base class implementation returns false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.CanDelete
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView object associated with the current System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl object supports the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary) operation.
member.value: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false. The base class implementation returns false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.CanInsert
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView object associated with the current System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl object supports the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary) operation.
member.value: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false. The base class implementation returns false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.CanSort
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView object associated with the current System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl object supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
member.value: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false. The default implementation returns false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.CanUpdate
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView object associated with the current System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl object supports the System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary) operation.
member.value: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false. The default implementation returns false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.AutoGenerateOrderByClause
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the OpenAccessDataSourceView object that is associated with the current OpenAccessDataSource control supports dynamic creation of an OrderBy clause.
member.value: true if the clause generation is supported; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.AutoGenerateWhereClause
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the OpenAccessDataSourceView object that is associated with the current OpenAccessDataSource control supports dynamic creation of a Where clause.
member.value: true if the clause generation is supported; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.AutoPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the OpenAccessDataSourceView object that is associated with the current OpenAccessDataSource control supports automatic paging. true if automatic paging is supported; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.AutoSort
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the OpenAccessDataSourceView object that is associated with the current OpenAccessDataSource control supports automatic sorting.
member.value: true if automatic sorting is supported; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.RT.DataSource.OpenAccessDataSourceView.StoreOriginalValuesInViewState
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates that original values from the select operation will be stored in view state when delete or update operations are enabled.
member.value: true if original values are saved in view state; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.summary: Gets or sets the fully qualified name of the typed IObjectScope context used by the OpenAccessDataSourceView instance.
member.value: A String that is the fully qualified name of the type.

member.summary: Gets or sets the typed IObjectScope context used by the OpenAccessDataSourceView control.
